configuration.jsScript: return {msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType};

additionalInfo.description:
Summarize all rain deltas in a single delta. 
The relevant variables that should come out are:
rc_incr : this is the total increment, taking into account the intensity correction, and therefore not nececessarily an integral number.
rc_delta: time in seconds between previous and current reading (for intensity calculations).

configuration.jsScript: return {msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType};

additionalInfo.description: Checks counter increments. If >1, we lost a packet.
Identity of the station device to which processed data will be returned.
Finalize the MQTT payload and topic

configuration.jsScript: return {msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType};

additionalInfo.description: Decouple message type from POST_TELEMETRY to a custom "SEND_MQTT" and defined the topic base.

configuration.jsScript: return {msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType};

additionalInfo.description: Checks if we have any payload on this branch
